Posted By: Totema (9/25/2012 6:42:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Yes, self mill will work out really well. Though most other decks will frown at this card.  
  
Think of guys like [Undead Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Alchemist), [Skaab Ruinator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skaab Ruinator), [Armored Skaab](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armored Skaab), [Chronic Flooding](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chronic Flooding), things like that. Mill enough of your own cards with flashback and such, while milling their deck with your zombies, then pull this card out for a win right when they don't expect you to be able to mill 20-40 cards at once.
posts.html:
Yes, self mill will work out really well. Though most other decks will frown at this card.

Think of guys like Undead Alchemist, Skaab Ruinator, Armored Skaab, Chronic Flooding, things like that. posts.post_content:
can't believe this card is rated so low. Anything that lets you reshuffle your graveyard is good in my opinion and I think it has to have a high cost because of the mill ability. I mean, what about an esper colored reanimator deck? self mill till you can reanimate the good stuff and then put it all back in your library and watch your opponent's best stuff get flipped. What's not to love?  
  
would be especially fun with [Echo Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Echo Mage) since he could double the effect.
